short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FOR EVERY QUESTION YOU SEARCH, FOR EVERY ACTION YOU TAKE, WE REWARD YOU!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rewards for surfing the Internet. This extension removes the tracker and blocks the annoying advertisements. Last but not the least, This extension rewards you for surfing the Internet and you can redeem rewards with vouchers.
